title: School
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "My first day of school was a disaster from start to finish."

questions.question: I arrived late to class.
The cafeteria served pizza for lunch.
My history teacher gave a pop quiz I wasn't ready for.
In botany, I had a sneezing fit from a plant and had to leave the room.
I found a lost wallet and returned it to the office.
I locked my keys in my car after school

title: Exercise
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "Exercise significantly improves mental well-being."

questions.question: Exercise builds large muscles quickly.
Running burns more calories than walking.
It helps manage stress by influencing brain chemistry and boosts mood.
It allows for clearer thinking, making it a powerful tool for mental health.
Exercise causes muscle soreness the next day.
Exercise improves posture and balance.

title: Trees
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "Trees provide many essential benefits to our environment."

questions.question: They offer shade and shelter for animals.
Trees produce oxygen.
Trees attract bees that make honey.
Leaves make a mess on sidewalks in autumn.
They help prevent soil erosion and floods.
Construction crews remove trees to build roads.

title: Parents
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "Parents can help their children be successful in school by encouraging them."

questions.question: Giving children unlimited pocket money builds aura.
Buying the latest smartphone will make them popular.
Letting children skip school when they feel bored is fine.
Parents should buy story books with pictures.
They can buy text books or tapes that help children learn to spell or read.
Parents should reward them when they get an "A".

title: Vacation
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "My visit to a slum area after the rainy season was a sad affair."

questions.question: A new health clinic had opened nearby offering free checkups.
The pits were still full of rain water and there was mud all around.
The polluted water had caused various diseases.
There was no home without a sick person.
Children were so thin and severely malnourished.
Local vendors sold fresh produce from spotless stalls.

title: Canada
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "Canada is one of the best countries in the world to live in."

questions.question: Canada has an excellent health care system.
Santa Claus officially lives in Canada (North Pole)
"Canada" comes from the Iroquoian word "kanata" meaning village.
Canadian students are taught by well-trained teachers and are encouraged to continue studying at university.
Cities are clean and efficiently managed, and they have many parks and lots of space for people to live.
The country has six time zones all around their territory.

title: Strawberry
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "This is how you bake a strawberry cake."

questions.question: Buy an expensive oven to make more quality strawberry cake.
Bring your friends over, in order to gain motivation to bake a strawberry cake.
You'll mix wet and dry ingredients.
You can pour the ingridients into prepared pans.
Bake at 177Â°C for 25-30 minutes.
Lastly, cool and frost with a strawberry buttercream or cream cheese frosting.

title: Graduate

Graduating guarantees immediate wealth.
Everyone who graduates will never change careers.

Graduation removes the need to learn new skills.

title: Cooking
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "Cooking requires a number of different skills."

questions.question: Only people with professional chef uniforms can cook well.
Knife skills are essential  because they speed up preparation.
Knowledge of seasoning and flavor balance turns basic ingredients into tasty, wellâ€‘rounded dishes.
Understanding heat control helps prevent burning, achieve proper textures, and cook food safely.
Time management and multitasking are needed to coordinate multiple dishes so everything finishes at the right moment.
You must use expensive gadgets to make good food.

title: Global Warming
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "There are many possible contributing factors to global warming."

questions.question: Global warming is caused only by natural cycles and never by human activity.
Turning off lights for one hour will stop global warming.
Warming happens because the Earth is getting closer to the Sun this year.
Burning fossil fuels releases large amounts of carbon dioxide.
Deforestation reduces the number of trees that absorb carbon dioxide.
Global warming causes the temparature around the world to rise.

title: Ring of Fire
description: TOPIC SENTENCE: "The Philippines lies along the Pacific Ring of Fire."

questions.question: The country hosts dozens of active and potentially active volcanoes.
Only islands with beaches are on the Ring of Fire.
The Philippines regularly experiences earthquakes and tsunami.
Being on the Ring of Fire means the country has no earthquakes at all.
There are 24 active volcanoes in the Philippines from the 750-915 volcanoes the Pacific Ring of Fire contains.
Volcanoes on the Ring of Fire are always safe to visit without restrictions.
